abstract: As Ken Starr’s successor, Mr. Ray ended up striking a deal that prevented Mr. Clinton from being prosecuted.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — One of the newest members of President Trump’s defense team, Robert W. Ray, has had pointed words about the highest office in the country: “No person is above the law, even the president of the United States.”
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
